Html: What does ABspam04MBAM mean?  Specifically, how can i have a 0 stack when I am AB spamming?  TY  Vickos

You basically have the general idea on what it means. But to put it bluntly, You Spam Arcane Blast. Between 0 and 4 stacks if Missle Barrage Procs  wait till 4 stacks to use Arcane Missles

There is another one ABspam024MBAM Which means that if you get Missle Barrage Procs before 2 stacks, use it at two stacks, else wait till 4 stacks.
And do answer how you can have a 0 stack and get MB, that can occur from 2T8 (or was it 4T8?), as well as from Arcane Barraging while moving.
